short_summary: Transport Canada (TC) is seeking the acquisition of 3 Aircraft interface electronics, and 2 other goods for the C-GSUR aircraft for the Air Services Directorate (ASD).
description: The transport Canada (TC), Air Services Directorate (ASD), is seeking the acquisition of 3 Aircraft interface electronics, is so stating in this Request for proposal (RFP) document.
duration_in_months: Now in its fifth month, the procurement process is due to complete by the end of August. The selected tenderers will receive notice and enter a contract shortly after the closing date of July 26, 2024.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
#### Contract Details
* **Contract Solicitation Title**: Procurement of Aircraft Parts for C-GSUR
* **Contract Reference Number**: CB-581-61324841
* **Publication Date**: July 2, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 26, 2024 at 10:00 AM Eastern Time
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Selective Tendering

#### Contract Description
The Transport Canada, Air Services Directorate (ASD) is seeking procurement of 3 aircraft parts for the C-GSUR. This procurement is a Request for Proposal (RFP) open only to pre-qualified Supply Arrangement holders for the T8493-140035 series.

#### Tender Requirements
* **Pre-Qualified Suppliers**: The procurement is open to only pre-qualified Supply Arrangement holders for the T8493-140035 series.
* **Procurement Documents**: The RFP documents will be distributed electronically by the contracting officer to the pre-qualified Supply Arrangement holders.
* **Inquiries and Submissions**: All submissions and inquiries should be addressed to the Contracting Authority, Tanya Nadeau, who can be reached at tanya.nadeau@tc.gc.ca or by phone at (343) 630-5331.

#### Contract Details
The expected contract start date is July 26, 2024, and the expected contract end date is August 30, 2024. The contract will be executed under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the procurement method is competitive selective tendering. The contracting authority is Transport Canada, and the contract location is the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Notes
* A Notice will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for the Supply Arrangement T8493-140035 series.
